column7: Classify the topic of the following news as "World", "Sports", "Tech" or "Business".
Your task is to identify the subject of the news piece and classify it into one of four categories: World, Sports, Business and Tech.
The goal is to identify the journal article according to its primary theme and determine whether it belongs to the World, Sports, Business, or Tech category.</prompt
Choose a word from World, Sports, Business and Tech to categorize the given text.
Classify the media report into one of the below-listed sections: World, Sports, Business, or Tech, considering the main topic.
Give the main topic of the news article and then choose from World, Sports, Tech and Business.
Determine the primary subject of the provided news article and classify it under one of the following categories: World, Sports, Business, or Tech.
